New Records: Gunnar Henderson tied a franchise record for shortstops with his 34th home run
Key Match Events: Henderson led off the first inning with a home run
Anthony Santander tied the score with an RBI single in the third
Slater put the Orioles ahead with a run-scoring double
Miscellaneous Highlights: Baltimore improved to 5-0 against Chicago this season
Others: Chicago dropped to 31-108 and lost its 21st straight game in which Chris Flexen started
Cedric Mullins homered with three RBI
Austin Slater and Henderson each drove in three runs for Baltimore
